title: Top 10 Travel Destinations for Summer 2015
text:
Top 10 Travel Destinations for Summer 2015 Written by: Caroline Nolan 07/21/15 - 8:14 AM EDT 
NEW YORK (MainStreet) -- Planning a last-minute summer getaway? Don't be surprised if you arrive at your vacation destination and bump into your neighbors.According to Kayak's Travel Hacker Data, residents of 28 U.S. states chose the same city as their top travel destination this summer. The report also looked into other cities that are trending for summer travel.Click through the list below to see which cities made the list. You may want to rush to these travel spots and join the fun, or avoid them altogether and spend your last few days of summer away from large crowds. 
10. Honolulu, Hawaii
